channel.title: Project Blade -Looking for members
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to my project Blade thread.
[size=16pt]Quick explanation.[/size]
[i]I recently had an idea of Creating My own server, And i am in search of members. *Note* I'm not looking for staff, But if i do notice great effort in your position you will be rewarded. I have been looking through my sources. I was thinking of using the project destiny source (V1.8) But, that will be left up to my members.[/i]
[b][i]Sources current features. Bugged specials (I'll fix) Fletching (adding a gfx) woodcutting (works) firemaking (I'll also fix this)
[size=14pt]This source has much potential.[/size][/i][/b]
[size=16pt]Some plans[/size] -Server-side- [b].Special attacks, I will be adding. .Items compatiable with silabsofts client. (FOR NOW) .Maybe some cleaning for the client.java. . 80-100% Non- combat skills. -More when the time comes-
-client-side- .471 game frame (maybe some vengence GFX) .Extract some models .Some different sprites
-Thats all for now[/b]
[size=16pt]What you can do to help![/size]
There are many postions that I have,
Beta testers (when the time comes) - - - - - - ETC.
[i]server-side Coders/Programmers[/i] - - - - - (I have experiance coding, So i will be helping here)
Client-side Coders/Programmers *VITAL, I can't client side code well* - - - - -
Backup hoster - Si force - Added you MSN, accept me.
[i][size=15pt]Dont even try to steal my password, All passwords will be encoded in salt. I hope i can trust you whoever Applys for this.[/size][/i]
Forum Builder(s) [size=15pt][/size]I might buy forums, Depending how this all works out. - -
Two for now.
[b][i]Why should I join the team?[/i][/b]
This was made for fun, this is where members of mopar can get together and create great peices of art. -No premium will be made. -No admins/mods will be sold of course.
If you are greedy and have a lust for pixels please click that "X" at the top of your browser, Thankyou.
[size=14pt]How do I apply?[/size]
[code] Postion. Experiance. Why you want to join? What you would like to be called. Msn,Aim, If you are uncomfortable posting it here Pm it, just Add me. Do you own any WebPages? If so post them here. Age It doesn't matter what it is. [/code]
[size=15pt]Rules Have fun! Be respectful![/size]
Thankyou for reading
~Blader

thanks for accepting me.

item.title: Project Blade -Looking for members
item.dc:creator: @Xblad3rX Xblad3rX
item.description:
@Xblad3rX wrote:

Hello, and welcome to my project Blade thread.

[size=16pt]Quick explanation.[/size]

I recently had an idea of Creating My own server, And i am in search of members. Note
I’m not looking for staff, But if i do notice great effort in your position you will be rewarded.
I have been looking through my sources. I was thinking of using the project destiny source (V1.8)
But, that will be left up to my members.

[b][i]Sources current features.
Bugged specials (I’ll fix)
Fletching (adding a gfx)
woodcutting (works)
firemaking (I’ll also fix this)

[size=14pt]This source has much potential.[/size][/i][/b]

[size=16pt]Some plans[/size]
-Server-side-
[b].Special attacks, I will be adding.
.Items compatiable with silabsofts client. (FOR NOW)
.Maybe some cleaning for the client.java.
. 80-100% Non- combat skills.
-More when the time comes-

-client-side-
.471 game frame (maybe some vengence GFX)
.Extract some models
.Some different sprites

-Thats all for now[/b]

[size=16pt]What you can do to help![/size]

There are many postions that I have,

Beta testers (when the time comes)

ETC.

server-side Coders/Programmers

(I have experiance coding, So i will be helping here)

Client-side Coders/Programmers VITAL, I can’t client side code well

Backup hoster

  • Si force - Added you MSN, accept me.

[size=15pt]Dont even try to steal my password, All passwords will be encoded in salt. I hope i can trust you whoever Applys for this.[/size]

Forum Builder(s) [size=15pt][/size]I might buy forums, Depending how this all works out.

Two for now.

Why should I join the team?

This was made for fun, this is where members of mopar can get together and create great peices of art.
-No premium will be made.
-No admins/mods will be sold of course.

If you are greedy and have a lust for pixels please click that “X” at the top of your browser, Thankyou.

[size=14pt]How do I apply?[/size]

Postion.
Experiance.
Why you want to join?
What you would like to be called.
Msn,Aim, If you are uncomfortable posting it here Pm it, just Add me.
Do you own any WebPages? If so post them here.
Age It doesn't matter what it is.

[size=15pt]Rules
Have fun!
Be respectful![/size]

Thankyou for reading

~Blader
